data.name: Last Light Demo
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220T CPU @ 2.80GHz (4CPUs),~2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
